selected_quotes: Excerpts from Rhodes' will: Scholarships for single, white males. #RhodesMustFall
How #Rhodes the racist misogynist perverted benevolence
Cecil John Rhodes' will who should get scholarships, basically scholars should be white @TC_Africa…
Explained: what Rhodes said in his will about who should get scholarships. #RhodesMustFall @RMF_Oxf…

citation.abstract: Rhodes was an ardent white supremacist who believed Africans to be inferior. He intended his scholarships to be for white males only. This has since fallen away.
citation.title: What Cecil John Rhodes said in his will about who should get scholarships

blogs.title: On #RhodesMustFall and what it means

facebook.title: What Cecil John Rhodes said in his will about who should get scholarships
facebook.summary:
The statue of Cecil Rhodes will be kept at Oxford despite protests.

Rhodes was an ardent white supremacist who believed Africans to be inferior. He intended his scholarships to be for white males only (this has since fallen away).
